channel.title: Logs [317] [Delta]
channel.description:
I want to keep a log of trading and talking.
the trade log should record who trades with who, and what is traded for what.
and the talk log is just plain recording who says what.
if anyone have any idea of how to do this, please reply. if any help, im using Delta.
